entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Pontiac
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:21 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 2:11 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 1.7°C
Wind: SE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
